title: 2024_summer_olympics_opening_ceremony
body:
The opening ceremony of the [[2024 Summer Olympics]] in Paris, France was held on 26 July 2024, and featuring the performances headlined by Celine Dion and Lady Gaga.

However, the ceremony has gained notoriety and criticism for various absurd imagery. Most notably the performance of the French band [[Gojira (band)|]] which featured the depiction of [[Marie Antoinette]] holding her [[disembodied head]], and the section featuring [[drag queen]]s and a [[nude]] singer that was originally meant to reference the Feast of Dionysus but is instead being widely mistaken for a parody of [[the Last Supper]].

title: sapphire_panlogism
body:
Touhou Chouseisho  ~ Sapphire Panlogism (東方潮聖書 ～ Sapphire Panlogism) is a fan-made Touhou Project game made using the Touhou Danmakufu ph3sx shooting game engine, created by Team Urban Magic. The game features a 6-stage story mode, along with an Extra Stage and an After-Extra "Carrefour" Stage.

It is notable for an in-game portrait of Reimu, as shown below, which briefly spawned a short trend of redraws and memes.

* !asset #22589922: Cropped screenshot from the game featuring the infamous smile.

h4. External links
* "Touhou Wiki page":[https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Sapphire_Panlogism]
* "Official website":[https://urbanmagic.itch.io/thsp]

title: flame_toys_windblade
body:
A [[model kit]] of [[Windblade]] from [[Transformers]], produced by [[Flame Toys]] and based on a design by [[Ban! (bansankan)|]].

It was first announced in 2019, however the initial design was met with controversy after the company posted prototype images to Twitter, and was met with a surge of comments claiming the figure design was oversexualized. The prototype images were soon removed from the company's social media pages, and in 2020 they posted concept art for a revised design more similar to Windblade's other appearances. Ban is still the designer for the new design.

h4. Appearance

* !post #2159425: Ban's original fanart
* !post #4097397: Initial design concept art
* !post #4097398: Initial design concept art
* !post #4022937: Revised design concept art

title: satyricon_(band)
body:
A Norwegian [[black metal]] band formed in Oslo in 1991. [[Sigurd Wongraven]] (Satyr) and Frost have been the band's core members since 1993. Satyricon was the first Norwegian black metal band to join a multi-national record label (EMI).

h4. External links

* "Official website":[https://www.satyriconofficial.com/]
* "Wikipedia: Satyricon (band)":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satyricon_(band)]

title: black_metal
body:
An extreme subgenre of [[heavy metal]]. Its musical characteristics are [[screaming|shrieked]] vocal style, heavy use of distorted [[electric guitar|guitar]] riffs with tremolo picking in order to emphasize atmosphere, and lo-fi recording. Lyrical themes typically revolve around hatred, Satanism, [[heresy]], blasphemy, [[darkness]], Paganism, [[depressed|depression]], [[suicide]] or such.

[[Darkthrone]] and [[Mayhem (band)|]] are notable black metal bands.

Use this tag when a post shows reference to various black metal bands, their [[album cover]]s, [[real life]] musicians, as well as its popular culture depiction. 

h4. See also

* [[Rock (music)|]]
* [[Heavy metal]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Black metal":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_metal]

title: darkthrone
body:
A [[black metal]] band originating from Norway. Formed in 1987, the band started with the death metal genre under the former name [i]Black Death[/i]. In early 1991 they embraced the black metal style. The band lineup currently consists of Fenriz and Nocturno Culto.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Darkthrone":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Darkthrone]

title: nisemono_chuuihou_(vocaloid)
body:
[i]Warning of Impostors[/i] (ニセモノ注意報), also translated as [i]Impostor Advisory[/i], is the second uploaded song of [[Shuuen no Shiori Project]], produced by 150P. This song is based of [[B-ko (shuuen no shiori)|]]'s discovery of her doppelgänger.

This song was first released on NicoNico, uploaded on 10 June 2012, sung by [[IA (vocaloid)|]]. It is later released as such in the album Re:Houkago -Shuuen Game-. When it was rereleased in the Shuuen -Re:write- album, it was sung by [[Kagamine Rin]]. It was also released in the Shuuen -Re:act- album, sung by B-ko's voice actress, [[Touyama Nao]].

h4. See also

title: titanfall_(series)
body:
A video game franchise developed by Respawn and published by EA. The series features a unique blend of fast-paced parkour-heavy combat on foot, and slower, more ability focused combat in the [[Titan (titanfall)|]] [[mecha]].

The series has two mainline entries and a mobile spinoff. The popular battle royale game [[Apex Legends]] is set in the same universe, but due to how it is largely treated as a separate entity,  Apex posts should not be tagged with this series unless they feature a direct crossover or reference beyond the shared weapons.

h4. Entries

* [[Titanfall]]
* [[Titanfall 2]]
* Titanfall Assault (Now-discontinued mobile game)
* Titanfall Online (Free-to-play MMOFPS adaptation of Titanfall 1 for the Asian market, canceled after a closed beta in South Korea)

h4. Fan Works

title: sdkfz_251
body:
The [i]Sonderkraftfahrzeug 251[/i] [[half-track]] was a [[World War II]]-era German [[armored personnel carrier]] designed by the Hanomag company, based on its earlier, unarmoured "Sd.Kfz. 11":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sd.Kfz._11] vehicle. The Sd.Kfz. 251 was designed to transport the [i]Panzergrenadier[/i] (German mechanized [[soldier|infantry]]) into battle.

Some sources state that the Sd.Kfz. 251 was commonly referred to simply as ""Hanomags":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanomag]" by both German and Allied soldiers after the manufacturer of the vehicle; this has been questioned, and may have been only a postwar label. German officers referred to them as SPW ([i]Schützenpanzerwagen[/i], or armoured infantry vehicle) in their daily orders and memoirs.

h4. See also

* [[list of ground vehicles]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Sd.Kfz._251":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sd.Kfz._251]

title: heine_wittgenstein
body:
The protagonist of [[Oushitsu Kyoushi Heine]], the new royal tutor for the 4 Granzreich princes. Heine is an adult man with a childlike appearance, yet is very serious and doesn't show much emotion, except when being mistaken for a child. He has a multitude of talents, and is stern but kind towards his charges. Not much is known about his past, except that he apparently knew [[viktor von granzreich|the king]] long before he came to the palace to take up his duties, used to tutor at a church (he still does), and was a violent man in the past. 

He has [[red eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[red hair]] with [[parted bangs]]. His outfit includes [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[black pants]], [[brown vest]], [[black coat]], [[black necktie]], [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]] and [[black headwear|black]] [[hat|cap]] with a white [[tassel]] attached to it. He wears [[glasses]] and commonly holds a [[riding crop]].  

h4. External links

* "Oushitsu Kyoushi Heine Wiki: Heine Wittgenstein":[https://oushitsu-kyoushi-heine.fandom.com/wiki/Heine_Wittgenstein]
other_names: ハイネ・ヴィトゲンシュタイン

title: ak-105
body:
The shortened/carbine version of the Russian [[AK-74M]] [[assault rifle]], chambered to fire 5.45×39mm ammunition. Introduced in 2001, it largely replaced the [[AKS-74U]] in service despite less-compact size.

h4. AK-100 rifle series

* [[AK-101]], 5.56×45mm NATO
* [[AK-102]], carbine variant of AK-101.
* [[AK-103]], 7.62×39mm 
* [[AK-104]], carbine variant of AK-103.
* AK-105
* [[AK-107]], 5.45×39mm, features a "balanced" operating system similar to that used in [[AEK-971]].
** [[AK-108]], 5.56×45mm NATO variant of the AK-107 .
** [[AK-109]], 7.62×39mm variant.
* [[AK-9]], 9×39mm 

h4. See also

* [[Kalashnikov rifle]]
* [[list of weapons]]

title: ak-101
body:
A [[Kalashnikov rifle]] chambered in 5.56×45mm NATO cartridge. Like most AK-100 series of [[assault rifle]] with black finish and polymer furniture, it is heavily based on the [[AK-74M]] system.

h4. AK-100 rifle series

* AK-101
* [[AK-102]], carbine variant of AK-101.
* [[AK-103]], 7.62×39mm

title: zentradi
body:
Usually the main antagonists in the [[MACROSS]] [[mecha]] anime franchise. An ancient [[space]]faring race of [[giant]] humanoid [[alien]] [[soldier]]s. 

They were created as proxy warriors by the first humanoid civilization in the galaxy, the [[Protoculture]], 500,000 years ago. They have been at war with the [[Supervision Army]] since then.

Physically, most of them resemble humans, though some have [[pointy ears]] and many diverse and unique skin, eye and hair colors. Prior to their first encounter with the human race, all members of the [b]Zentradi[/b] race were only reproduced and artificially fabricated through cloning.

The Zentradi army is a fearsomely powerful force of millions of space warships and mecha produced in thousands of huge and massive automated space factories scattered across the [[galaxy]] and legions of expendable giant clone troops created in mass production facilities.

Zentradi in giant form are called [[Maclone]]s, while their human sized variants are known as [[Miclone]]s. Female Zentradi are called [[Meltrandi]].

title: komillia_maria_jenius
body:
A fictional female character from the [[MACROSS]] science fiction franchise.

She first appeared in [[Choujikuu Yousai Macross]] TV series from 1982 and also appears in the [[Pc Engine]] [[video game]]s [[Macross 2036]] and [[Macross: Eternal Love Song]] released only in Japan in 1992.

[b]Komillia Maria Jenius[/b] is the first daughter of [[Maximilian Jenius]] and [[Millia Jenius]]. Thus, she [b]is the first [[Zentradi]]/Human hybrid ever[/b].

title: garage_kit_(medium)
body:
Photos of real [[garage kit]]s. Unlike [[model kit (medium)|]]s, garage kits are typically premade static figures in very limited production runs that come unpainted and must be painted by the purchaser. Usually made of resin.

Garage kits are typically based on [[original]] characters or used as a way for fans to provide more risque unofficial figures of characters that wouldn't receive such figures officially. Some artists will 3D model and then physically mold and paint their own garage kits, even if they are not offered for sale to the public.

title: haniwa_(statue)
body:
Terracotta clay sculptures buried with the dead as funerary objects during the proto-historic "Kofun period":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kofun_period in Japan. Various types of haniwa were created, ~ soldier, [[horse]], [[dog]] and other [[animal]]s.
The haniwa soldiers wear ancient-style body armors, tentatively called "tankou":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%AD%E7%94%B2] (lit. short armor) or "keikou":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%8C%82%E7%94%B2] (lamellar armor) by historians. They are not counted as [[Japanese armor]].

[[Hanny]], one of the [[monster]] tribes in the [[Alicesoft]] games are modeled on these haniwa figures.

They appear in [[Animal Crossing]] as [[gyroid (animal crossing)|]]s.

In [[Blue Archive]], haniwa exist as skill level up materials. Strangely, they're bright pink and resemble a sex toy.

h4.See also
* [[doguu]]
* [[doll]]
* [[figure]]
* [[Ooi! Hanimaru]]

h4.External links
* "Wikipedia: Haniwa":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haniwa

title: yunhua_lu
body:
A character in [[Kanata no Astra]].

A shy, quiet girl who constantly apologizes for everything she does. [spoiler]This is a result of being emotionally suppressed by her mother.[/spoiler] Her mother, Lucy Lum, is a world-famous singer. Yun-Hua has a great singing voice, but her mother constantly berated her and told her she should not bring attention to herself, so she distanced herself as much as possible.

title: funicia_rafaeli
body:
A character in [[Kanata no Astra]].

[[quitterie_rafaeli|Quitterie]]'s adopted sister, [spoiler]who was adopted into the family after the death of her parents.[/spoiler] She is a cheerful, positive girl who wants to get along with [[quitterie_rafaeli|Quitterie]].

She carries around a [[puppet]] named Beego with her.
other_names: フニシア・ラファエリ

title: quitterie_rafaeli
body:
A character in [[Kanata no Astra]].

A rich heiress who is the daughter of a famous doctor. She finds it difficult to trust other people besides Zack, who is her childhood friend. She received very little attention from her mother.

She has an adoptive younger sister, [[funicia_rafaeli|Funicia]].
other_names: キトリー・ラファエリ

title: ulgar_zweig
body:
A character in [[Kanata no Astra]].

A quiet, antisocial, but highly intelligent boy who does not get along well with the rest of the crew. His father is the vice-principal of Caird High. He's good at handling a gun. His late older brother was a freelance journalist who stumbled upon a secret he shouldn't have which resulted in his death, leading Ulgar to despise and hold revenge against Marco Esposito, [[luca_esposito|Luca Esposito]]'s father.
other_names: ウルガー・ツヴァイク

title: combination_gun
body: A [[gun]] with multiple barrels of different types and calibers, usually one or two [[shotgun]] barrels and one or two [[rifle]] barrels. Almost always [[break action]]. Resembles a multi-barrel shotgun, but usually distinguishable by the different width of the barrels and, if the view provided by the image permits, the lack of [[rifling]] in some of them.

title: vignette_tsukinose_april
body:
A character from the anime [[gabriel_dropout|Gabriel Dropout]]. Just as [[gabriel tenma white|Gabriel]] is an angel working in the human world under the guise of a high school student, Vignette is a demon doing the same thing, and the two are good friends.

Vigne is everything Gab is supposed to be: sweet, good-natured, and generous, to the point where it affects her salary as a demon. How Hell managed to produce her is the biggest mystery of the series.

Voiced by [[Oonishi Saori]].

h4. External links

* "Gabriel Dropout Wiki: Vignette April Tsukinose":https://gabdro.fandom.com/wiki/Vignette_April_Tsukinose
other_names: 月乃瀬=ヴィネット=エイプリル

title: typhoon_devil_(chainsaw_man)
body:
[[Chainsaw Man]] character.

The Typhoon Devil is a devil that embodies the fear of [[typhoon]]s. It is the secondary antagonist of the Bomb Girl arc.

The Typhoon Devil is subservient and respectful towards [[Reze (Chainsaw Man)|]] and willingly cooperates with her for its own protection.

The Typhoon Devil's true form resembles a gigantic humanoid surrounded by a swirling storm of brain matter with the top part of its head exposed revealing more brain matter which is connected to the storm around it. In [[Mitaka Asa]]'s flashback, his face is that of an old man with a thick mustache.

The second incarnation of the Typhoon Devil has the face of a baby instead of an old man with a thick mustache.

title: unlight
body:
Unlight was a 2010 free-to-play collectible card battle and role-playing browser game developed by the Japanese company Techway. With multiple language versions the game boasted over two million players, becoming extremely popular by 2014. By 2017 all of the game servers were shut down, and in 2019 the source code was given away for free.

title: izakaya
body:
A Japanese [[bar (place)|]]. Comes in a variety of styles, but the most well-known has the patrons sitting or standing near the [[bar (place)|]], with wooden [[menu]] boards on the walls. Bottles of [[sake]] can be on the countertop, while the customers are served with plates of food and likely [[beer]]. Customers are usually seated very close together.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Izakaya":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Izakaya]

title: sekai_no_yamachan
body:
An [[izakaya]] bar based in Nagoya, Japan that serves Tebasaki (Japanese chicken wings). Has a number of stores under its banner throughout Japan, as well as in Hong Kong, Thailand, Taiwan, and Malaysia. Its iconic mascot character, [[toriotoko_(sekai_no_yamachan)|toriotoko]], is one of the icons of Nagoyan food culture.

title: cmyk
body:
The color system used in most printed products. CMYK stands for [b]C[/b]yan, [b]M[/b]agenta, [b]Y[/b]ellow, and [b]K[/b]ey (Black).

This tag is used when the colours are prominently displayed in an artwork, such as being listed on items or contained in objects.

h4. Examples

* !post #1229978

title: soonie_(eversoul)
body:
An obtainable character in [[Eversoul]], belonging to the Beast faction. She is the Soul of the "Turtle Ship":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turtle_ship], the ship type utilized by the decorated Korean admiral "Yi Sun-sin":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yi_Sun-sin] in his battles against the Feudal Japanese navy.

She is an antiquated [[rabbit girl]] who serves as a naval commander in the nation of Gaon. Her adult-like mannerisms, experiences, and combat prowess are often overshadowed by her childish and petty behavior, a point of interest for many Souls within her friend group, and a source of teasing from her closest friend [[Jiho_(eversoul)|]].

She is a [[pink_hair|pink-haired]], [[red_eyes|red-eyed]] girl of short stature. Said hair is relatively [[long_hair|long]] for her height, and atop her head are her two [[rabbit ears]] that move accordingly depending on her mood and a small [[turtle]] resting on a [[hair ornament]]. She usually dresses in [[hanbok]], featuring a black [[long_sleeves|long-sleeved]] top and a long and wide [[blue skirt]], followed by a pair of child-like [[blue_footwear|blue]] [[boots]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #6038426

title: sad_cat_dance_(meme)
body:
A dance [[meme]] originating from post #5613805, based on "an interpretation of a scene":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eL_vd2Xcqu4] (post #4934981) in [[Chainsaw Man]]. 

In chapters 85 and 86, [[Higashiyama Kobeni]] is working in a family restaurant when the [[Chainsaw Devil]] arrives. Through a combination of misunderstandings and clumsiness on Kobeni's part, the Chainsaw Devil proceeds to kill her customers and coworkers, then takes a crying Kobeni on a date, culminating in making her play [[Dance Dance Revolution]] while sobbing and getting a perfect score.

In the memetic format, one character hands cat costume items to another, then silently begs (to the point of kneeling so low they stand on their head) until the other puts them on and starts dancing, usually [[blush]]ing and [[sobbing]]. The tune used in the memetic format is a portion of "a sped-up version of the mashup tune [i]Gypsy in My Mind[/i] by Never Dull":[https://youtu.be/bmorUXjaQgs?t=101] that contains the remix of "[i]Gypsy Woman[/i] by Crystal Waters":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_KztNIg4cvE] (hence 'Gypsy' in the title) and "[i]The Bomb! (These Sounds Fall into My Mind)[/i] by The Bucketheads":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=no1vf854aUc], which in turn samples several opening bars and the line "Street sounds swirling through my mind..." (misheard as "These sounds fall into my mind") from "[i]Street Player[/i] by Chicago":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HJMw8cUGjwI].

h4. Examples

* !post #5613805: Origin

h4. External links

* "Know Your Meme: Sad Cat Dance":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/sad-cat-dance]

title: goonya_monster
body:
Goonya Monster is a Japanese party game developed by MUTAN and the second entry in the Goonya series after Goonya Fighter. The game features artwork and character designs by illustrator [[Terada Tera]] and music by popular Japanese bands such as [[fake_type|FAKE TYPE]] and Sakanamon. In Goonya Monster busters have to kill enemies and collect their souls to place them in a "Soul Pot" while outrunning a player-controlled Monster.

title: quanxi_(chainsaw_man)
body:
Quanxi, also known as ‘The First Devil Hunter’, is a hybrid of the [[Crossbow Devil (Chainsaw Man)|]], former Japanese Devil Hunter, and infamous assassin from China.

Quanxi worked as a Devil Hunter in Japan and became known as the 'First Devil Hunter'. While working as a Devil Hunter, Quanxi was partnered with [[Kishibe (Chainsaw Man)|]] while he was a young and new Devil Hunter. Upon their first meeting, [[Kishibe (Chainsaw Man)|]] flirted with and asked her to become his woman. This was followed by her immediately slapping him across the face and soundly rejecting him. This same cycle would repeat over the next 9 years, until she realized she was interested in girls to which [[Kishibe (Chainsaw man)|]] admitted to having already known.

At some point in time after this, she left Japan and moved to China to begin work as an assassin for the Chinese government. She formed a harem of 4 female Fiends ([[Quanxi's Group (Chainsaw Man)|]]) either before or after moving to China.

She is able to transform into a hybrid of the [[Crossbow Devil (Chainsaw Man)|]], triggered by pulling a crossbow bolt out of her right eye.

h4. Appearance

* !post #7089264

h4. [[Quanxi's Group (Chainsaw Man)|]]

* [[Cosmo (Chainsaw Man)|]]
* [[Pingtsi (Chainsaw Man)|]]
* [[Long (Chainsaw Man)|]]
* [[Tsugihagi (Chainsaw Man)|]]

title: bloodhound_(apex_legends)
body:
Playable legend in [[Apex Legends]]. A hunter from Talos who has canonically won the Apex games several times.

Bloodhound's default appearance consists of a [[fur trim|fur trimmed]] [[brown jacket]], [[brown pants]] with [[knee pads]], [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]], and [[red gloves]], with their face obscured by a [[rebreather]], [[goggles]], and [[helmet]]. Their appearance leaves their gender visibly [[ambiguous gender|ambiguous]], though they are officially stated as [[1other|non-binary]]. Little is known of Bloodhound's appearance under the mask, only that they are [[scar|scarred]] from exposure to coolants.

Bloodhound's favorite weapon is the [[charge rifle]] and their heirloom is the [[Raven's Bite]]. They are often seen with a [[crow]] companion named Artur and are romantically involved with [[Fuse (apex legends)|]] as of Season 15.

Voiced by [[Allegra Clark]] in English and "Kinoshita Sayaka":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%9C%A8%E4%B8%8B%E7%B4%97%E8%8F%AF] in Japanese.

title: anvil
body:
A basic metalworking [[tools|tool]] consisting of a heavy [[metal]] block (typically steel or iron) with a hard surface on which piece of metal is shaped, or [[hammer]]ed. Anvils are used by metalsmiths (such as [[blacksmith|blacksmiths]]) in forging.

The most well known shape for an anvil is the "London Pattern," which has the key features of: a horn, a step, a face, a hardy hole, and a pritchel hole.

h4. Examples

* !asset #22574637

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Anvil":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anvil]

title: mk48
body:
The [b]Mk 48[/b] (Mark 48) is a belt-fed general-purpose [[machine gun]] chambered in 7.62×51mm NATO. The weapon was designed in the early 2000s, following a request from United States Special Operations Command for a replacement for the [[M60 (machine gun)|]].

It is manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Manufacturing Inc., a division of [[FN Herstal]] based in the [[United States|US]].

h4. See also

title: sig_p220/p226
body:
The [b]P220[/b] a semi-automatic [[handgun]] developed in 1975 and manufactured by [[SIG Sauer]], available in various caliber such as 9×19mm and .45 ACP. It features a decocking lever and a squared-off trigger guard. 

The [b]P226[/b] is basically the major variant of P220 with same mechanism and external appearance, but adopted to use double-stack [[magazine (weapon)|]] instead of earlier single-stack one. 

This tag also applies to the smaller variant of the P220, [b]P225[/B].

h4. See also

* [[P226 (Girls' Frontline)]]

h4. External links

* "IMFDb":https://www.imfdb.org/wiki/SIG-Sauer_P220_pistol_series
* "Wikipedia: SIG Sauer P220":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SIG_Sauer_P220
* "Wikipedia: SIG Sauer P226":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SIG_Sauer_P226

title: a-ya_(shuuen_no_shiori)
body:
One of the main male characters from [[Shuuen no Shiori Project]]. 

He has slightly [[unkempt]] [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] with an [[ahoge]], and [[red eyes]]. [[Bags under eyes|Bags under his eyes]] are sometimes visible, and his hair may [[hair between eyes|extend between his eyes]]

His [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], a [[black sweater]] over it, a [[red necktie|red]]-[[white necktie|white]] [[two-tone necktie]]. Over them he wears a [[blazer]] with [[red trim]]s and a [[school emblem]] on the left breast of the blazer. Underneath, a [[red pants|red]]-[[black pants|black]] [[plaid pants]].

His [[casual]] outfit consists of a [[white shirt]] underneath a [[black hoodie|black]] or [[purple hoodie]] with white stripes on the side and [[black pants]]. 

h4. External links

title: d-ne
body:
One of the female main protagonists of [[Shuuen no Shiori Project]]. She had her debut in the [[song name|song]] [[saru mane isu tori game (vocaloid)|Saru Mane Isu tori Game]].

D-ne has [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]] ([[black hair|black]] in the novels) and [[blue eyes]] ([[black eyes|black]] in the novels). [spoiler]After acquiring the Monkey's Paw and wishing for [[b-ko (shuuen no shiori)|B-ko]]'s red (often depicted as [[blue ribbon|blue]]), she cuts her hair [[short hair|short]]. And further uses her wishes to obtain eyes identical to B-ko's.[/spoiler]

Her [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]] with a  [[purple sweater]] over it, [[red necktie|red]]-[[white necktie|white]] [[two-tone necktie]]. Over them she wears [[white jacket|white]]/[[yellow jacket|yellow]] [[blazer]] with [[red trim]], decorated with a [[school emblem]]. Similar to [[C-ta]], she wears her blazer completely [[unbuttoned]]. She also wears a [[red skirt|red]] [[plaid skirt|plaid]] [[pleated skirt]], [[black thighhighs]] or [[black pantyhose]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]].

h4. External links

* "Pixiv Encyclopedia: D音":[https://dic.pixiv.net/a/D音]
* "Shuuen no Shiori Project Wiki: D-ne":[https://shuuen-no-shiori.fandom.com/wiki/D-ne]

title: masking_tape_(medium)
body: Masking tape art is a type of art which makes use of strips of masking tape as an [[unconventional media|unconventional]] tool for artistic production. The type of tape most often used is a patterned tape known as washi tape (和紙テープ). The artist may construct their art entirely from masking tape or only use it for colors or patterns.

title: kalar_(race)
body:
A race of [[elf]]-like humans who appear in the [[Rance (series)|]], [[Toushin Toshi]], and [[Evenicle (series)|]] series.

They are an all female race (with the exception of [[Kesselrink]], who became male after becoming a Dark Lord).

They are known for their [[pointy ears]], [[blue hair]] and [[blue eyes]], and a large, red [[jewel]] embedded in their foreheads (which turns blue after they lose their virginity). The only exception is [[Hunty Kalar]], who instead possesses [[black hair]] and [[yellow eyes]].

The [[angel]] [[Labelcase]] from [[Toushin Toshi II]] is notable for bearing a strong resemblance to the Kalar, but is not considered a member of the species.

h4. Notable Kalar

* [[Pastel Kalar]]

* [[Kesselrink]] (formerly)

One day, a new threat called [[Dark Matter (kirby)|]] ruins the Rainbow Bridges connecting the Rainbow Islands and possesses [[King Dedede]] to try to take over Dream Land. Once again, it's up to [[Kirby]] to make things right. This time, he has some help in the form of his animal friends [[Rick (kirby)|]], [[Coo (kirby)|]], and [[Kine (kirby)|]].

title: gundam_build_divers_re:rise
body:
The sequel to [[Gundam Build Divers]]. It follows an entirely new cast and has a notably different tone from the original.

The series takes place 3 years after the original Build Divers and follows a misfit team of GBN players who take on a mysterious mission that takes them to an unknown area of GBN that is notably unlike anything else in the game [spoiler]and later revealed to be a faraway planet called Eldora[/spoiler], where a race of [[furry|furries]] are being hunted by machines known as the One-Eyes.

title: ruined_king:_a_league_of_legends_story
body: A 2021 [[League of Legends]] turn-based single-player RPG first announced in 2019 with a character trailer on Halloween 2020 on the day of the Worlds Final. Made by Airship Syndicate as part of Riot Games' Riot Forge project allowing other developers to produce titles based on League and other games. The announcement trailer also marked the first appearance of [[Viego (League of Legends)|Viego]] as the titular Ruined King. h4. Playable Champions * [[Miss Fortune (league Of Legends)|Miss Fortune]] * [[Illaoi]] * [[Braum (League of Legends)|Braum]] * [[Yasuo (League of Legends)|Yasuo]] * [[Ahri (league of legends)|]] * [[Pyke (League of Legends)|Pyke]]

title: problem_solver_68_(blue_archive)
body:
Problem Solver 68 is one of the clubs at Gehenna Academy in [[Blue Archive]].

A club notable for taking "fixer contracts" and conducting other illegal business. Its members are usually on the run from the [[Prefect Team (blue archive)|]], and sometimes even the [[Justice Task Force (blue archive)|]].

The number 68 is believed to be derived from the first two characters (陸八) of Aru's family name, Rikuhachima (陸八魔).

Being a faction tag, this should only be used when all members of the group are present and equally in focus.

h4. Members

* [[Aru (blue archive)|]]
* [[Mutsuki (blue archive)|]]
* [[Kayoko (blue archive)|]]
* [[Haruka (blue archive)|]]

title: zip_22
body:
A [[handgun]] chambered for .22 caliber rounds produced by the US Firearms Manufacturing Company (USFA), which prior had been known for its high-quality [[Colt Single Action Army]] replicas.

The Zip .22 was intended to be the "world's safest gun", but proved disastrous between poor ergonomics, extensive feeding issues, and needlessly complex operation. The gun's failure would bankrupt USFA while the weapon itself would become the butt of jokes among firearms enthusiasts everywhere.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: USFA ZiP .22":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USFA_ZiP_.22

title: justice_task_force_(blue_archive)
body:
In [[Blue Archive]], Justice Task Force is one of the School Clubs of Trinity General School.

It is nominally a self-governing police force and service organization of Trinity General School, but in reality serves as the Armed Forces of Trinity and are affiliated with the [[Tea Party (blue archive)|]]. There are three or four main members of the club that are emphasized in the story, supported by numerous "mob" characters.

Their outfit of jet [[black serafuku]] & [[red neckerchief]], [[black wings|black]] [[feathered wings]], red [[halo]], and [[black choker]] is a stark contrast to the lighter-colored students at Trinity.

While [[Koharu (blue archive)|]] was briefly suspended from this group, she was re-instated after certain story events and continues to work for the force.

Being a faction tag, this should only be used when all or most members of the group are present and are in focus. If the only people present are [[Justice Task Force Member (blue Archive)|]] mob characters, don't use this tag.

title: soka_gakkai_international
body:
A modern Japan-based international lay religious movement which based itself in the Shōshū sect of Nichiren Buddhism. Originally founded in the early 1930s, it was disbanded following suppression by Japan's wartime government before reorganizing in 1946. In 1991, they were excommunicated from Nichiren Shōshū over doctrinal disputes.

It is often labeled a cult by critics both in Japan and from abroad due to the significant emphasis on praising its current president [[Ikeda Daisaku]], as well the involvement of its members and leadership in notable incidents involving aggressive proselytization, violent encounters with Buddhist clergy, political posturing through the Komeito Party, and for fostering other dubious associations, such as with the late ex-Panamanian dictator [[Manuel Noriega]].

Media appearances featuring prominent members such as actress [[Hisamoto Masami]] became the [[meme]] [[Atama Ga Paan (meme)|]] on [[niconico|Nico Nico Douga]] when they were used as sources for MAD movies.

title: megazone_23
body:
[i][b]Megazone 23[/b][/i] (メガゾーン23, [i]Megazōnu Tsū Surī[/i]), also known as [b]Megazone Two Three[/b], is a four-part [[cyberpunk]] [[mecha]] anime OVA series from the [[1980s_(style)|80s]]. 

It was produced by [[AIC]], written by Hiroyuki Hoshiyama, and directed by Ishiguro Noboru, [[Itano Ichirou]], Yatagai Kenichi and [[Aramaki Shinji]]. 

Original mecha designs for the OVA were created by Aramaki Shinji, while character designs were made by [[Mikimoto Haruhiko]].

The series was originally titled [i]Omega Zone 23[/i] (オメガゾーン23, [i]Omega Zōn Tsū Surī[/i]) but the title was changed just before its official release during 1985.

Set in the mid eighties, the series deals with the adventures of a young man called Yahagi Shougo who is given a mysterious advanced [[motorcycle]] linked to a secret about their world so big and amazing it may change the lives of Shougo and his friends forever.

Referred to as "Arai-san" by [[Fennec (kemono friends)|]], which is short for "araiguma", the Japanese word for raccoon, lit. "washing bear", leading to common depictions of her [[washing]] things or having an interest in doing so.

Raccoon spends most of the episodes searching for [[Kaban (kemono friends)|]], who she believes to have stolen her hat, with the level-headed Fennec tagging along.

She has a verbal tic in which she ends all of her sentences with "noda".

title: fu_(dragon_ball)
body:
A character from the [[Dragon Ball]] video games.

First debuting in a guidebook for [[Dragon Ball Online]] as a baby, he appears as a minor antagonist as an adult in [[Dragon Ball Xenoverse]] and a major antagonist in [[Dragon Ball Heroes]]. He is the son of [[Towa (Dragon Ball)|]] and [[Mira (Dragon Ball)|]], and is the nephew of [[Dabura]]. In Xenoverse, Dabura regards him as an heir to the Demon Realm's throne, but Fu prefers conducting his science experiments instead. In Dragon Ball Heroes, he is often seen being the caretaker of [[Dogidogi (Dragon Ball)|Dogidogi]].

His initial design as a baby was done by [[Toriyama Akira]]. However, the original creator of his adult designs is unknown.

[Spoilers] In Dragon Ball Heroes, depending upon whether you are reading the manga, watching the anime, or playing the game, Fu either willingly or unwillingly gains [[Mechikabura]]'s power, turning him into a Dark King. Later in the same arc, he is reverted into the form of a child by [[Tokitoki (dragon ball)|]].[/spoilers]
other_names: フュー(ドラゴンボール)

title: mira_(dragon_ball)
body:
A [[Dragon Ball]] video game character.

Originally debuting in [[Dragon Ball Online]], Mira appears as a major antagonist in [[Dragon Ball Xenoverse]] and [[Dragon Ball Heroes]], with cameos in several other video games in the franchise. He is often seen alongside [[Towa (Dragon Ball)|]]. He is the father of [[Fu (Dragon Ball)|]] and is noted to have been made with the DNA of several major characters in the series.

His design was initially drafted by [[mikidai7]], with [[Toriyama Akira]] heavily correcting it.

title: towa_(dragon_ball)
body:
A [[Dragon Ball]] video game character.

Originating from [[Dragon Ball Online]], Towa has appeared in [[Dragon Ball Xenoverse]] and [[Dragon Ball Heroes]] as a major antagonist, with cameos in several other games. She is often seen alongside [[Mira (Dragon Ball)|]] while conducting her scientific experiments. She is the mother of [[Fu (Dragon Ball)|]] and the younger sister of [[Dabura]].

Her initial design was drafted by [[mikidai7]] and corrected by [[Toriyama Akira]].

[Spoilers] In Xenoverse 2, she dies alongside Mira after he absorbs her in his thirst for power. In contrast, in Dragon Ball Heroes, she is currently still alive and is only absorbed by Mira if she's on the verge of death or outmatched by a foe. [/spoilers]

title: tileable
body:
Posts composed of a pattern that, if cropped correctly and used as a "tiled" background, will repeat seamlessly with no visible edges.

The following JavaScript snippet can be useful to check whether an image is tileable without further cropping. Running it on the post page will replace the page with only the image repeated in a 3×3 grid:

[code]
let {fileUrl, width, height} = document.querySelector('.image-container').dataset;
document.body.outerHTML = '<body style="background:url(\''+fileUrl+'\') repeat; min-width:'+(width*3)+'px; min-height:'+(height*3)+'px;"></body>';
[/code]

h4. See also
* [[Tag Group:Image Composition]]

title: griffon_(last_origin)
body:
A playable unit in [[Last Origin]].

She is a bioroid belonging to the Sky Knights series and is part of Squad 21. She is one of the first characters met by the [[Commander (last origin)|]].

She fights using small [[missile|missiles]] fired by two portable [[missile launcher|missile launchers]], held in [[dual wielding|each hand]]. Her character design is most likely based on the [[Saab Gripen|Saab JAS 39 Gripen]], a [[fighter jet]] of the Swedish Air Force (the English translation of "Gripen" is [i]griffin[/i]).

She has a [[tsundere]] personality. Often teases (and is teased by) [[LRL (last origin)|]], especially when [[Amy Razor]] is not around.

She has [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] with an [[ahoge]] and [[blue eyes]], is [[large breasts|large-breasted]]. Her base skin consists of a [[black jacket]], covering a [[blue leotard|blue]] [[ribbed leotard|ribbed]] [[leotard]] and a [[crotch plate]]. She wears [[white thighhighs]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[leather boots|leather]] [[knee boots]]. [[eyewear on head|On her head]] is a pair of [[goggles]]. She is propelled on her back by [[machinery]] in the form of a small [[fighter jet]].

She was designed by [[kakiman]] and is voiced by [[Katou Emiri]] in the Japanese version.

h4. Official art

* !post #3634123: Default
* !post #3634121: Ceremonial uniform
* !post #4476293: [[Idol clothes]]

title: harumi_kazuto
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Yasuda Suzuhito]]. His songs are produced by YASUHIRO.

Since he was little, he was always fascinated by trains as they brought happiness to him. Now he wants everyone to feel the same happiness that he experienced before.

title: kokonoe_konoe
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Karasumaru]]. His songs are produced by keeno.

title: sea_lantern
body:
A [[block (minecraft)|]] in [[Minecraft]] found in ocean monuments. Blue in color and emits light.

h4. See also
* [[List of Minecraft characters]]

h4. External links
* "Minecraft Wiki: Sea Lantern":https://minecraft.wiki/w/Sea_Lantern

title: tenma_nanase
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Asmarine]]. His songs are produced by rerulili.

Nanase is the older brother of [[Tenma Rikka|Rikka]] who is always indecisive when someone asks him for advice. As long as something makes Rikka happy, he doesn't care about it.

title: otoha_iosuke
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Hakuseki]]. His songs are produced by PinocchioP.

A stoic idol who wants to be acknowledged by many people in the world. Especially surpassing his mother, Kyrie.

title: tenma_rikka
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Kuroyuki]]. His songs are produced by Nashimoto We.

Rikka is [[Tenma Nanase|Nanase]]'s younger brother. Since he was little, he's always been forced by his mother to wear girls clothes and use feminine pronouns. Although he's already getting used with it, he will eventually return to his true self of what he should be like.

title: sakaki_yairo
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by kara2kmr. His songs are produced by RyuuseiP.

title: tokito_ichiya
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Mephisto (angraecum)|]]. His songs are produced by 40mP.

A worn-out boy but has a pure heart. He went to the world of dreams in order to wake up his brother, [[Tokito Reiji|Reiji]] who had an accident while protecting him 7 years ago. Stick with Reiji as he adores him. Until now it's been a habit that everything was his fault.

He often carries around [[Rei (clock over orquesta)|]], a [[teddy bear]] gifted to him by his older brother.

title: tsuyuri_azuma
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Kyouichi]]. His songs are produced by john.

He's often called a liar because he has a lot of unnecessary words and long analogies that don't conveys of what he is trying to say in the end. One time, he hurt a child with whom he had become close, and with that regrets, he wished to undo the lie that he had told.

title: tink_(clock_over_orquesta)
body:
A character from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

She was designed by [[Shikimi (yurakuru)|]]. Her songs are produced by Kurenai88.

She's a mysterious [[doll]] who invites all of the protagonists into Never↓and.

title: azusawa_mito
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Sazanami Misa]]. His songs are produced by Scop.

A singer-songwriter and a prodigy. Even though he has a disease in his throat, he entered the world of dreams to continue singing. He used to think that other people were all aliens and he would never be able to understand them, but the words of Iosuke start to change his mind...

title: sakurakoji_nika
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Tomida Tomomi]]. His songs are produced by 164.

He has a well-dressed appearance and a brilliant mind. Also a man of great fortune. But too perfect to be understood even by his family, he was lonely and sought someone who would be close to his heart.

title: note_block_(minecraft)
body:
[[block (minecraft)|Block]] in [[Minecraft]] that plays a note when activated with a [[redstone_dust|redstone]] signal. Often used to create in-game music. Jukeboxes look identical aside from a slot at the top for [[music disc (minecraft)|]]s, and are thus included in this tag.

h4. See also
* [[List of Minecraft characters]]

h4. External links
* "Minecraft Wiki: Note Block":https://minecraft.wiki/w/Note_Block

title: fuwa_tokihito
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Arisaka Ako]]. His songs are produced by Nem.

His life never be the same as strange things start to happening since he became the current owner of a pocket watch that inherited by his grandfather.

He often carries around a [[rubber duck (clock over orquesta)|]], a [[toy]] gifted to him by his grandfather.

title: tokito_reiji
body:
One of the main protagonists from [[Clock over ORQUESTA]].

He was designed by [[Fuyuomi]]. His songs are produced by Sasakure.UK.

He has been in a coma for 7 years after saving his brother, [[Tokito Ichiya|Ichiya]], from a car accident. At the same time, he is also playing in Never↓and with [[Tink (clock over orquesta)|]].

title: music_disc_(minecraft)
body:
A rare collectible in [[Minecraft]] that can be found in dungeons or when a [[creeper]] is killed by a [[skeleton (minecraft)|]].

h4. See also
* [[List of Minecraft characters]]

h4. External links
* "Minecraft Wiki: Music Disc":https://minecraft.wiki/w/Music_Disc

title: pump_action
body:
A repeating [[gun|firearm]] action that is operated manually by moving a sliding handguard on the gun's forestock. When shooting, the sliding forend is pulled rearward to eject any expended cartridge and typically to cock the hammer/striker, and then pushed forward to load (chamber) a new [[ammunition|cartridge]] into the chamber. Most pump-action firearms use an integral tubular [[magazine (weapon|magazine]], although some do use detachable box magazines. Pump-action is typically associated with [[shotgun]]s.

h4. List of pump action firearms

* [[Benelli M3]]
* [[Benelli Supernova]]
* [[Fabarm SDASS]]
* [[FN TPS]]
* [[ithaca m37|Ithaca 37]]
* [[Kel-Tec KSG]]
* [[KS-23]]
* [[MAG-7]]
* [[Mossberg 500]]
* [[Mossberg 590]]
* [[NeoStead 2000]]
* [[Remington 870]]
* [[Remington Model 31]]
* [[RMB-93]]
* [[Serbu Super-Shorty]]
* [[SPAS-12]]
* [[SPAS-15]]
* [[Standard Manufacturing DP-12]]
* [[Type 97 shotgun]]
* [[UTAS UTS-15]]
* [[Valtro PM-5]]
* [[Winchester Model 1897]]
* [[Winchester Model 1912]]

h4. See also

* [[combat shotgun]]
* [[list of weapons]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Pump action":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pump_action]
* "Wikipedia: Pump-action shotguns":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Pump-action_shotguns]

body:

h4. External links

title: eliisa_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[blonde hair]]. Her eyes are [[green eyes|green]].

A young lady from the northern farmlands. Eliisa's family runs a big ranch, where she grew up surrounded by different animals, so she cannot resist the attraction of the furry ears and tails. Eliisa came to One Han City to stay with her relatives, so as to experience what it's like be living in a city. But the urban lifestyle is so different that it has led her into a few silly, fun, episodes. She's still getting used to city life.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5208568

title: sara_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]]. Due to her [[heterochromia]] her left eye is [[blue eyes|blue]] while her right is [[green eyes|green]]. Her skin is [[dark-skinned female|dark]].

Sara is the top dancer of the touring performing group "Soul". She was crowned as "Cassiopeia on Stage" for her passionate dance moves as well as her attractive but elegant physique. Sara got her distinctive appearance from her parents, who came from different countries and backgrounds. Her different-colored eyes can charm people; some even feel that her looks can reach deep into their feels. She's a cat lover, and her characters are also as unpredictable as one. One day, Sara stepped into the Mahjong Soul Shrine by coincidence, and because of the cat hobby of hers she soon became very fond of [[Ichihime]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5211891

title: saionji_kazuha
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[white hair]] [[half updo|partially]] tied into a [[ponytail]]. Her eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

Master instructor of Nishiba-ryu, Kazuha has practiced martial arts since young and is proficient in both Kendo and archery. She's been called "sword saint" but she doesn't like the title as it sounds old.

On the surface, Kazuha looks serious and prudent, but she is a shy person deep inside. If there is anything that might beat her inside a dojo, it can only be the attention of the audience. That's why Nishiba Dojo doesn't allow any spectators, and this gave it a mysterious tint from which many rumors were perpetuated.

Kazuha started playing Mahjong to make a wish at Mahjong Soul Shrine. Her playstyle is actue and decisive. As for why she came to Mahjong Soul Shrine, she has never spoken about it. A common theory is that it has to do with her deceased parents.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5599687

title: shiraishi_nana
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[blonde hair]] tied into a [[ponytail]]. Her eyes are [[green eyes|green]].

She can easily become close with anyone. But sometimes people feel awkward because of her wild laid-back spirit. This is the first impression Nana left for most people. With her carefree personality and responsible attitude, she is no doubt a trustworthy class representative. From time to time, she helps out sport clubs with her excellent sport talents, but she never considers to join any of them. After all, she puts her class duties above sports.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5208620

title: cake_(minecraft)
body:
Rectangular-shaped [[cake]] with white frosting and red toppings from [[Minecraft]].

* !post #4246815

h4. See also
* [[List of Minecraft characters]]

h4. External links
* "Minecraft Wiki: Cake":https://minecraft.wiki/w/Cake

title: nadeshiko_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]]. Her eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

Nadeshiko lost her mother when she was young, and so she was raised by her father who is a mechanic. She has a natural love for motorbikes, beer, and traveling. Her height often gives others the impression that she is cold and distant, but she is actually very easy to get along with. Nadeshiko is a talented Mahjong player; she learned most of games, including Mahjong, without any guidance.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5179762

title: morikawa_ayako
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] tied into [[twintails]]. Her eyes are [[purple eyes|purple]]. There is a [[mole]] under her [[mole under eye|right eye]].

A girl rumored to have "Mastema" sealed in her left hand. She hopes Mahjong Soul Shrine can grant her wish of removing the seal, so she started learning Mahjong. She is interested in the occult and often spouts strange things, as a result, she has been alienated by her classmates because they say she is "creepy". Deep in her heart, Ayako is eager to make friends and she is making continuous efforts towards this goal.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5224046

title: ravager_(minecraft)
body:
Hostile [[Minecraft]] mob, accompanies [[pillager (minecraft)|]]s in raids.

h4. See also
* [[List of Minecraft characters]]

h4. External links
* "Minecraft Wiki: Ravager":https://minecraft.wiki/w/Ravager

title: nanami_reina
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short]] [[blue hair]] that is [[half updo|partially tied]] into a [[side ponytail]]. Her eyes are [[grey eyes|grey]]. She uses a [[wheelchair]].

A little girl in One Han City who lives with her uncle. Under the influence of her father, she has shown great interest and talent in coffee, which is why she helps her uncle at the caf every day. The fact that her parents died of a car accident on the way to celebrate her birthday affected her deeply, making her unable to walk despite her leg injury has fully recovered. It would be best if somebody can bring her out of the dark past.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5198070

title: amalia_solaris_(vtuber)
body:
An English-speaking [[Indie virtual YouTuber]]. She's depicted as a [[dragon girl]] with [[green hair]].

* Her 1.0 model was drawn by [[gomiyama]].
* Her 2.0 model was drawn by [[roxoah]].

title: yuzu_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[green hair]] tied into [[twintails]]. Her eyes are [[green eyes|green]]. She is a [[red panda girl]] with [[red panda ears|ears]] and a [[red panda tail|tail]].

This Yuzu-sama, written as witch and pronounced as justice, will protect world peace without fail!" I wonder.

When she says, "Don't treat Yuzu like a child!", she seems to be shining with the Asaba High School badge on her uniform...that means she's a high school student!?

h4. Appearance

* !post #5599684

title: kitami_sawako
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[grey hair]] with an [[ahoge]]. Her eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]].

Despite Sawako's somewhat naïve looks, she has everything well-organized at home. She is also able to enjoy her hobbies at free time, which has made nearby housewives very envious as they often come to her for tips. She has won a lot of popularity in her neighborhood, especially amongst the kids as they often refer to her as "the ideal mother".

h4. Appearance

* !post #5223417

title: onodera_nanaha
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]]. Her eyes are [[purple eyes|purple]]. She wears [[glasses]].

Currently a part-time employee at a bookshop, Nanaha is a connoisseur of adult novels. She believes that true love can only be born out of a clash of both the mental and the physical, thus she does not have a high regard for "platonic love". She often gains a passion for a new hobby after reading about it, but she abandons them just as fast for other books. Though her enthusiasm is shortlived, she has still done well in a lot of her interests, which might be a talent of hers.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5599707

title: terasaki_chihori
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

As an editor-in-chief, Chihori has her own principles to get on with people. For her, discovering news and finding the truth is more interesting than anything else. Chihori has an eye for any suspicious circumstances, which helps her to find out all the secrets. If you don't want to be her target, please be an obedient person~

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] tied into a [[ponytail]]. Her eyes are [[brown eyes|brown]]. She wears [[glasses]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5245241

title: zechs_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[brown hair]]. His eyes are [[grey eyes|grey]]. He is a [[wolf boy]], having both [[wolf ears|ears]] and a [[wolf tail|tail]].

A hunter who loves freedom and violence. He is [[Ein (mahjong soul)|]]'s childhood friend who he now sees as a rival. Knowing that Ispōichi is a good “hunting ground” and that there is a successor to the famous swordsmanship school “Nishiu-ryu”, Zechs came to this city to become the best hunter in the world. "Hunting" in mahjong is a completely new experience, but he's a competitive player who will soon get used to it.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5598548

title: fujimoto_kirara
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[blonde hair]] tied into [[twintails]]. Her eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]]. Her skin is [[dark-skinned female|dark]].

In other people eyes, Kirara is by all means a fashionable hot girl. She can often be flirty and looks like a master of relationships, but she actually has no experience in love. She loves fashionable makeups and follows the latest fashion trends in many different sources. She also spends a lot of money on makeups, and often has financial problems as a consequence...

h4. Appearance

* !post #5226560

title: ryan_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[white hair]] that is tied into a [[short braid]]. His eyes are [[purple eyes|purple]]. There is a red [[diamond (shape)|diamond]] [[facial mark]] on his left cheek.

A talented [[magician]] from a dancing group named Soul. He is a cute yet extremely clingy child. Many find him harmless in a [[Mahjong]] game, but he could always win by surprise. And when he wins, he would say something like "All thanks to the blessings of onesan". Sometimes, one might get caught off guard by his words, which renders the listener blush. But just look at his innocent face... He probably just doesn't know what he's talking about.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5198079

title: kaguyahime_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]]. Her eyes are [[red eyes|red]]. She is a [[rabbit girl]] with [[rabbit ears]].

This girl has rabbit ears and calls herself Kaguyahime. She declares that anyone who touches her ears will be cursed by the Moon. Occasionally, she may quote the famous line "On behalf of the Moon, I shall exterminate you" and makes you wonder whether she is really a goddess or not. While her appearance looks like a cute girl, she enjoys pranking others and lying. After her arrival at the Mahjong Soul Shrine, she started to battle for the ownership of the shrine and the rivalry between her and Ichihime got really intense...

h4. Appearance

* !post #5223762

title: nikaidou_miki
body:
A free-to-use starting character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]]. Her eyes are [[brown eyes|brown]]. She has a [[mole]] under her [[mole under eye|right eye]].

A mysterious female Mahjong player. She is intelligent with a flirtatious nature. Therefore, people often find her to be unpredictable. She owns a pet hedgehog and gorgeous gems are her favorite.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5179731

title: takanashi_hinata
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[purple hair]]. Her eyes are [[purple eyes|purple]].

Hinata loves gardening, and hence she joined the school club to deepen her knowledge. Even during the summer vacations, Hinata often goes to school to take care of plants, and she enjoys to record the progress of their growth with photos she takes. Hinata has always been a very sensible girl. As her parents became more and more busy with their careers, she would choose to stay at home, read diaries and browse photos of her childhood, no matter how desired she wants to go out with them for a nature tour.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5226700

title: saitou_osamu
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]]. His eyes are [[grey eyes|grey]]. In most art of him, he can be seen wearing [[glasses]].

Osamu is perfect as a company director; he is calm, decisive and performs his daily routines like an accurate robot. When it comes to work, he is strict to himself as well as his employees, so they often refer to him as the "Devil Boss". If one has to find out a weak point of his, it is probably his younger sister who is still in high school, Mami.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5245205

title: takigawa_natsuhiko
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[red hair]]. His eyes are [[yellow eyes |yellow]].

The captain of Asaha High School Soccer Club, an optimistic and straightforward boy who always speaks his mind. His dream is to become a pro soccer player playing for one of the big international clubs. While he is very popular in school, he is rather ignorant of other people's feelings towards him and thus remains single and believes himself to be unpopular.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5199035

title: yagi_yui
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair]] in a [[half updo]] that is tied into a small [[hair bun|bun]] on the left side. Her eyes are [[green eyes|hazel]].

Yui is a genius with an IQ of 180, but people keep their distance from her because she cannot interpret their emotions. Still, she longs to understand others and to be understood. On a chance visit, she came to the Mahjong Soul Shrine, and she started to change. Other than coffee and snacks, being her favourite beverage and food, Yui really has a poor sense of taste.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5208641

title: enchantment_(minecraft)
body:
Items in [[Minecraft]] that have been given various enchantments using an [[enchantment table]]. These items have an animated glistening effect, which is almost a faint purple in color.

h4. Examples
* !post #7619812: An enchanted [[minecraft pickaxe|pickaxe]]
* !post #4888193: An enchanted [[book]]

h4. See also
* [[Enchantment table]]
* [[List of Minecraft characters]]

h4. External link
* "Minecraft Wiki: Enchanting":https://minecraft.wiki/w/Enchanting

title: kaavi
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short ]] [[blonde hair]] with [[grey hair|grey]] [[colored tips|tips]]. Her eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]]. She is a [[rabbit girl]] with [[rabbit ears|ears]] and a [[rabbit tail|tail]].

A mysterious fortune teller who deeply believe that ones fate is inevitable and unavoidable. She opposes any effort in trying to change fate because she simply cannot stand meaningless struggles. One of her main motives in becoming a fortune teller is probably the pleasurable moment in delivering someones fate and the amusement of watching them react in a desperate and ugly way.

h4. Appearance

* !post #4012497

title: ein_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[orange hair]]. His eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]]. He is a [[fox boy]], having both [[fox ears|ears]] and a [[fox tail|tail]].

Ein is the descendant of an ancient race. Their most significant trait is their appearance. Male or female, old or young, all of them have some characteristics that can be linked to animals. He took his father's words to look for a hunting ground when he was 16. Accidentally, he stepped onto the land of far east where his instinct was awakened by a certain object. It is at this moment, he realized he have already found his "hunting ground".

h4. Appearance

* !post #5208587
When a character has plus (+) and minus (-) symbol in their pupils.

title: himekawa_hibiki
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] that is [[blue hair|blue]] on the [[colored inner hair|inside]] and [[purple hair|purple]] on the bangs. Her eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

A NEET that happens to be living in the great era of virtual reality. After she made her first fortune, she successfully got rid of the constant nagging from her family. She is now a well-known streamer for an anonymous website. She is also an extremely skillful gamer that has a silver tongue, which has shaped her into a person who never loses, be it in trash-talking or actually playing the game. To make her stream more interesting, she would fake her defeat and make a spectacular comeback to amaze her fans.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5200225

title: a-37_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]]. His eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]]. His skin is [[dark-skinned male|dark]].

Some strange beings have been showing up in the Mahjong Soul Shrine these days. For example, a weapon master who lost his luggage so he couldn't stay in One Han City legally. This handsome guy has to take shelter at your place. During his mission, he pays up his rent by offering you protection. However, what on earth is his secret mission about?

h4. Appearance

* !post #5200069

title: daebak_ghost_pepper
other_names: テバクゴーストペッパー
テバクラーメンゴーストペッパー

title: igarashi_haruna
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[blue hair]] tied into a [[half updo]] with a [[ponytail]]. Her eyes are [[red eyes|red]].

Haruna is a girl with endless power, who never gets tired throughout the whole day. She is an optimist type, who can screw around with boys. Haruna can't resist to have an ice pop and once made a great speech about her goal "to try all the flavors of ice pop in the world" in her composition class. In her spare time, she always brings cat food to the street cats nearby and plays with them. Although Haruna calls herself "Leader of Cats", the street cats seem to regard her as a small attendant who often brings food for them.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5226624

title: kujou_riu
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]]. Her eyes are [[pink eyes|pink]].

Like [[Mikami Chiori|Chiori]], Riu was also born in Tokyo. Her father and Chiori's father are good friends. Because Chiori's parents are away from home most of the time, Riu has been living with Chiori and taking care of her like an elder sister ever since they were children. She also started playing Mahjong because of Chiori. Over time, Kujou fell in love with the game. Her hobby is to collect all kinds of beautiful dresses.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5223832

title: ninomiya_hana
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short]] [[brown hair]]. Her eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]]. She wears [[glasses]].

An occasional chance brought Hana into Mahjong. It didn't take long for her to notice that people would take her seriously once she showed her capabilities on the Mahjong table. However, Hana probably hasn't realized it by herself yet that she shines while playing Mahjong. With her confidence blossoms, she would become so different from the regular her, a shy and insignificant girl who only knows gardening.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5198096

title: tsukimi_zan
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] tied back into a [[ponytail]]. His eyes are [[grey eyes|grey]]. There is a [[scar across eye|scar]] over his right eye.

Zan isn't his real name, but the name of a desolate kendo gym. He picked this name only to remind himself the past that he was bearing. But when others asked him about it, he always responded with "it's been too long to remember".

To him, Mahjong is only a habit, not a hobby, so he never gets addicted and stops playing after making a profit. He often uses this income to buy wine for himself, and buy candies for kids if he sees them hanging around. Unfortunately, kids are often wary of a middle-aged man like him and seldom come close.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5200268

title: qi_xi
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[pink hair]] that is tied into a [[short ponytail]]. His eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

Can't go home before he can matchmake 999 couples?! The boy claiming to be the God of Love has come to One Han City and announced that he would make everyone begin a relationship. But does such a young boy really understand what love is? "Hmph! I have collected all you humans' love guides, so there shouldn't be any problem!"

h4. Appearance

* !post #5199017

body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]] that is [[short hair with long locks|shorter in the back and longer in the front]]. Her eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow]].

Fu Ji is the owner of Luck and Fortune and has the face of a 16-year-old girl. But according to an insider, she looked exactly like how she looks now when his great-great-great-great-grandfather played mahjong in this dojo. There are two taboos in Luck and Fortune: don't take the owner's money, and don't talk about her age.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5223735

title: xenia
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[brown hair]] that is tied into [[twintails]]. Her eyes are [[red eyes|red]].

Being born a noble is probably not as much a blessing as most people believe. To Xenia, the world beyond the cage-like walls of her home is always strange yet full of beauty. With a rebellious nature, she is filled with resentment for the inflexibility and harshness of her family. Xenia's greatest dream is to leave family in pursuit of her own freedom.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5244694

title: kitahara_lily
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

A [[nun]] from the North Country. A few years ago, she took part in a Mahjong tournament at Tamashii Shrine. Since then, she has settled down in a monastery in Ichiban City and has become a reliable presence for her followers. 

While she has been described as "a person who embodies purity and kindness, and treats the worldly people with the most ardent love," she says, "My smile has the power to bring out the dark desires hidden deep in people's hearts." There is a rumor that she invites people to fall. No one can see into her true intentions, so the truth will forever remain veiled in mystery from the past to the present and into the future.

She has [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]]. Her eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]]. There is a [[mole]] under her [[mole under eye|right eye]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5599919

title: joseph_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[multicolored hair]] that is [[white hair|white]] on the top and [[brown hair|brown]] on the bottom. His eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]]. He has a [[beard]].

As the host of an adventure channel, Joseph has loved animals and the nature since his childhood. Despite his young age, he has almost traveled all around the globe. Under the suggestion of his friends, he started adventuring as a career. His humorous speech and bold actions brought the adventure show back to life. Sometimes, you can see him in a Mahjong club sitting in door for the entire afternoon.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5200261

title: akechi_hideki
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]]. His eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

Akechi Hideki is the leader of his university's mahjong club. Even though Hideki was raised through prestigious ivy league schooling, however he always shows his courteous nature and gives a warm smile to anyone he meets. Influenced by his grandmother, Hideki often likes to make local yaku even if the rule doesn't allow for this. There seems to be a shroud of mystery to his past. Every time someone brings up relatable topics of the past, Hideki would slyly change the topic entirely.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5224013

title: shinomiya_natsuki_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[brown hair]]. His eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

Shinomiya Natsuki is a common college boy as well as a part-time bartender of LULLABY. Like many Otakus, Shinomiya spends all his spare time in playing video games and reading mangas, and behaves like a chunibyo in certain circumstances. Under the influence of the owner of LULLABY, Shinomiya learned and became found of Mahjong.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5245231

title: sammir_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[long hair|long]] [[blue hair]] that is tied into a [[ponytail]]. His eyes are [[aqua eyes|aqua]]. 

A young man gentle and free like a breeze. He gives off the impression of a poet, listens attentively to everyone with a smile, and in turn shares tales he collected from all around the world with ease. However, he never mentions his past, and sometimes stares blankly at the starry sky. Maybe he will be willing to share his own stories as you become more familiar.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5598470

title: ishihara_usumi
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[white hair]]. His eyes are [[yellow eyes|yellow ]]. 

Despite his laidback and carefree character, Usumi Ishihara is actually quite reliable and popular amongst the teachers and students. Apart from being the president of the student council, he is also the founder of the pastry club, which often faces the threat of being disbanded due to lack of members. To save his club, Usumi starts to recruit new members while trying to avoid being "hunted" by the vice president of student council, [[Kisaragi Ren (mahjong soul)|Ren]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5200246

title: kisaragi_ren_(mahjong_soul)
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] that is typically tied into a [[short ponytail]]. His eyes are also [[black eyes|black]]. He wears [[glasses]].

As the vice president of the student council, Ren is serious, reliable and seems to have more power than the president, [[Ishihara Usumi|Usumi]]. This isn't surprising given that the president is always seen running around, trying to avoid him... It is said that Ren has a list of "problematic students". Do you happen to be on it?

h4. Appearance

* !post #5198072

title: ichinose_sora
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

He has [[short hair|short]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[black hair]]. His eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]].

People often say that "there is a price to pay for being too smart". Ever since he was a boy, Ichinose paid for it with his weak and frail body which made him prone to sickness. His world view is rooted in science and he believes that everything can be explained through scientific methodology. Once upon random change, Ichinose happened upon the Mahjong Soul Shrine. He thought that this was a very interesting game of probabilities, and so he decided to join in.

h4. Appearance

* !post #4061824

title: suzumiya_anju
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]] that has a curled [[ahoge]]. Her eyes are [[purple]]. 

Anju claims that she is a "type KR-976" artificial intelligence. Most of the time, she is rather quiet and would respond to all your questions with a mechanical tone. However, when the question is beyond her ability to interpret, she would reply with "warning, warning, low battery, unable to perform any duty" and avoid the question by pretending to be offline. Her hobby is to record everything that has happened around her, because as an artificial intelligence she needs to gather more data for learning, so her behaviors can better mimic those of a human.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5223901

title: hina_momo
body:
An unlockable character from [[Mahjong Soul]].

She has [[short hair|short]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[blonde hair]]. Her eyes are [[aqua eyes|aqua]].

She firmly believes Mr. Rabbit is real and is always looking for the legendary "wonderland". Her friend, [[Igarashi Haruna|Haruna]], encouraged her to learn Mahjong using the excuse of "winning Mahjong Soul Shrine's Mahjong contest can open the road to the wonderland". Despite being a beginner, she is quite famous in the Mahjong club because of her god-blessed luck.

title: yakuza
body:
[i]For the video game series known outside Japan as [b]Yakuza[/b], see [[Ryuu ga Gotoku (series)]][/i].

The Yakuza are a traditional organized crime group in Japan. Well known for their code of honor and ruthless method used against enemies or traitors. Members often have elaborate [[full-body tattoo|full body]] or large [[back tattoo]]s, known as [[irezumi]]. Often notated with the following number: [b]893[/b].

h4. See also

* [[bousouzoku]]
* [[gangster]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Yakuza":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yakuza]

title: sagaben
body:
A Japanese dialect spoken in Saga Prefecture and some other areas, such as Isahaya.

The Saga dialect, like most dialects of rural Kyushu, can be nearly unintelligible to people who are accustomed to standard Japanese.

h4. Notable characters who speak Saga dialect

* [[Katsuki Yuuri ]] ([[Yuri!!! on Ice]]) [tn]Only when speaking to relatives or drunk[/tn]
* [[Minamoto Sakura]] ([[Zombie Land Saga]])

h4. See also

* [[Tag group:Japanese dialects]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Saga dialect":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saga_dialect

title: tohokuben
body:
Group of Japanese dialects spoken in the Tōhoku region. Usually considered the stereotypical "rural hick" accent.

This dialect family is infamous of its lax pronunciation of vowels (/i/ and /u/ in particular) and insertion of voiced stops and nasals between syllables. It also has a tendency to use [i]be[/i] or [i]-ppe[/i] in place of the standard [i]darou[/i] and [i]-rou[/i].

Rural farmer characters often speak some variety of the Tohoku dialect family. Younger characters whose native dialect is Tohoku tend to be embarrassed of their accent. As such they will usually strive to pronounce words properly in Standard Japanese, with their native accent only slipping out in emotional moments or when they are speaking to family members (this tends to be a plot point).

Tohoku dialects are usually adapted into English as a [i]heavily[/i] "rural 'hillbilly redneck' accent":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Appalachian_English].

h4. Notable characters who speak Tohoku dialects

* [[Chi-Chi (dragon ball)|]] ([[Dragon Ball]]) [tn]faint traces[/tn]
* [[Kazami Yuuka|Noukarin]] ([[Touhou]]) [tn]only in her "Noukarin" fan incarnation[/tn]
* [[Son Goku|]] ([[Dragon Ball]]) [tn]faint traces[/tn]
* [[Yukino Bijin (Umamusume)|]] ([[Umamusume]])

title: yamanoteben
body:
The [i]other[/i] Japanese dialect spoken in Tokyo. Generally considered an upper-class or [i]intelligentsia[/i] dialect, and is associated with affluent districts of Tokyo located on the Western side.

h4. Notable characters who speak in a [i]distinctive[/i] Yamonote dialect

* [[Dracula_(kaibutsu-kun)|]] ([[Kaibutsu-kun]]) 
* [[Kanzaki Sumire]] ([[Sakura Taisen]])

h4. See also

* [[Edoben]]
* [[Tag group:Japanese dialects]]

title: ye_olde_zipangese
body:
Faux 'stage' archaic Japanese dialect, used to emulate an Edo-era aristocrat or courtesan way of speech. Commonly given to dignified-sounding characters who speak in an old-fashioned style. 

For female characters, this often heavily involves the use of "warawa" and "-nanoja", to the point that this is sometimes called the "nanoja dialect" or "nanoja loli (speak)".

This stage dialect is usually translated into English as a faux-Shakespearean dialect.

h4. Notable characters who speak a faux archaic dialect

* [[Hatsuharu (kancolle)|]] ([[Kantai Collection]])
* [[Holo]] ([[Spice and Wolf]])
* [[Nagi (Kannagi)|]] ([[Kannagi]])
* [[Nagato (AZUR LANE)|]] ([[Azur Lane]])
* [[Nisshin (kancolle)|]] ([[Kantai Collection]]) (Hybrid variant with [[Hiroshimaben]])

title: kuroba_kaito
body:
The civilian identity of [[Kaitou Kid]] in [[Magic Kaito]].

Kaito is a trickster magician who loves pulling pranks on his childhood friend [[Nakamori Aoko]]. He insists to her that he isn't Kaitou Kid despite his obsession with the thief's tricks (since they are his own magic tricks).

Voiced by [[Yamaguchi Kappei]].

title: harumi_kajika
body:
